results.name: Touhou Fan Game Jam Black Lives Matter Collection

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: 2 ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 32 (256 bit)
  • Processor: 500 ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Sierra 10.12+
  • Processor: The one they put in your mac most likely
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Most Macs and macbooks from 2015 and onwards run the game just fine. It's free, just download it and try it out!
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: the one they DIDNT put in your mac
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 and Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: 2 ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Pentium 2000
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
